title.rendered: Republic Day celebrations at Mission Education centre

content.rendered: The Mission Education centre Max Vision Social Welfare Society at Gurugram celebrated Republic Day on 26th January, 2017. 155 students participated in the celebrations. The choir group of the center presented various patriotic songs. Many students also participated in the parade and went for a rally to mark the celebrations.
